resources.string:
Hello, my name is Ikechukwu Iroka. I am an android developer who is currently learning Kotlin in other to improve my skill. 
Kotlin is such a wonderful language to learn because it really gets reed of a lot of boilerplate in Java. I am really happy though that i learnt Java because its not so difficult understanding Kotlin since its OOP inclined. 
Kotlin indeed is a modern language. The designers need to be praise for focusing their mind on readability. Normally, I should be looking for a book that explains Kotlin from the very basics. But I am not. All am doing is to read Kotlin code, if I see an unfamiliar syntax, I read it up. 
Such a delight learning Kotlin and I hope to improve in it.
